slots.name: upload_file
slots.prompt: upload any files you may have

zendesk.ticket_body: user_type: {{entities.user_type}} topic: {{entities.topic}} issue:{{entities.issue}} detail:{{entities.detail}} issue type: {{entities.issue_type}} view: {{entities.view}}

webhook.api_body: {"ticket": {"comment": {"body": "user_type: {{entities.user_type}} topic: {{entities.topic}} issue:{{entities.issue}} detail:{{entities.detail}} issue type: {{entities.issue_type}} view: {{entities.view}}"}, "subject": "{{entities.issue_type}}", "requester": {"name": "MyraLabs Test", "email": "{{entities.email}}"}}}
webhook.response_text: Thank you for contacting us. A support ticket ({{response.ticket.url}}) has been created for you and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
